mapper.insert: insert into tb_app (app_id, app_name, english_name, address, picture_name, create_date, intro, description, company_id, attribute, run_type, flag, run_data, data_num, param, off_line, command, title, method, max_task, app_doc ) values (#{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pictureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attribute,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{runType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{runData,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{offLine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{command,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxTask,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appDoc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update tb_app
app_name = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
english_name = #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
picture_name = #{pictureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
attribute = #{attribute,jdbcType=INTEGER},
run_type = #{runType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER},

data_num = #{dataNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
param = #{param,jdbcType=INTEGER},
off_line = #{offLine,jdbcType=INTEGER},
command = #{command,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
max_task = #{maxTask,jdbcType=INTEGER},
app_doc = #{appDoc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_app set app_name = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, english_name = #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture_name = #{pictureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, attribute = #{attribute,jdbcType=INTEGER}, run_type = #{runType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, run_data = #{runData,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data_num = #{dataNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, param = #{param,jdbcType=INTEGER}, off_line = #{offLine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, command = #{command,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, max_task = #{maxTask,jdbcType=INTEGER}, app_doc = #{appDoc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_app set app_name = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, english_name = #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture_name = #{pictureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, attribute = #{attribute,jdbcType=INTEGER}, run_type = #{runType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, run_data = #{runData,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data_num = #{dataNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, param = #{param,jdbcType=INTEGER}, off_line = #{offLine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, command = #{command,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, max_task = #{maxTask,jdbcType=INTEGER} where app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT app.app_id,app.app_name from tb_app app where app.off_line=#{offLine}
and app.company_id=#{companyId}

select sum(temp.data_num) runNum,temp.company_id companyId from (SELECT DISTINCT p.project_id,p.data_num,ucr.company_id from tb_app a left join tb_report r on a.app_id=r.app_id left join tb_project p on p.project_id=r.project_id left join tb_user u on u.user_id=p.user_id LEFT JOIN tb_user_company_relat ucr on p.user_id=ucr.user_id where a.off_line=#{offLine} and p.user_id not in(${testAccountIds})
and r.flag=#{flag} and r.period=#{period}) temp GROUP BY temp.company_id
select app_id,app_name from tb_app where company_id = #{companyId } and attribute = #{attribute } and off_line=#{offLine } and run_type != 0
select app_id,app_name from tb_app where run_type != 0 and attribute = #{attribute } and off_line=#{offLine }

SELECT group_concat(c.classify_name separator ';') classifyNames ,a.*,com.company_name companyName from tb_app a LEFT JOIN tb_app_classify_relat acr on a.app_id=acr.app_id LEFT JOIN tb_classify c on acr.classify_id=c.classify_id LEFT JOIN tb_company com on a.company_id=com.company_id GROUP BY a.app_id order by a.off_line,a.app_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into tb_app ( app_name, english_name, address, picture_name, create_date, intro, description, company_id, attribute, run_type, flag, run_data, data_num, param, off_line, command, title, method, max_task, app_doc ) values (#{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pictureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{attribute,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{runType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{runData,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{param,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{offLine,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{command,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxTask,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{appDoc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
select count(app_id) from tb_app where app_name = #{appName }
and app_id!=#{appId}

SELECT group_concat(DISTINCT sc.screen_name separator ';') screenNames, group_concat(DISTINCT acr.classify_id separator ';') classifyIds, group_concat(DISTINCT afr.format_id separator ';') fileFormatIds , a.* from tb_app a LEFT JOIN tb_app_classify_relat acr on a.app_id=acr.app_id LEFT JOIN tb_screen sc on sc.app_id=a.app_id LEFT JOIN tb_app_format_relat afr on afr.app_id=a.app_id where a.app_id=#{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY a.app_id order by a.off_line,a.app_id desc;
mapper.update: update tb_app set app_name = #{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, english_name = #{englishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, picture_name = #{pictureName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intro = #{intro,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, attribute = #{attribute,jdbcType=INTEGER}, run_type = #{runType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, run_data = #{runData,jdbcType=INTEGER}, data_num = #{dataNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, param = #{param,jdbcType=INTEGER}, command = #{command,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, max_task = #{maxTask,jdbcType=INTEGER}, app_doc = #{appDoc,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
